metadata.title: CVE-2020-8015 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A UNIX Symbolic Link (Symlink) Following vulnerability in the packaging ofexim in openSUSE Factory allows local attackers to escalate from user mailto root. This issue affects: openSUSE Factory exim versions prior to4.93.0.4-3.1.

criterions.comment: exim4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
